name: ApogeeVR
description:
Apogee VR is a sci-fi shooter with the power of the ominigun, a high tech gun that can help you defeat the enemy aliens, and scape from their base.

Use the Shield to protect you from the enemy blasters, and use the GunTool to solve the puzzle in your way.

Controls:

  •  Joystick/Trackpad: Teleport, Snap Turn
  • Trigger:  Shoot
  • Grip: Grab
  • Y, B: Toggle Laser to pull objects to your hand. (The Force)
  • X (while holding the gun): Toggle a menu where you can transform your gun.

Asset used:

  • Unity Snaps.
  • Cyber Soldier by Will Morillas.
